components.description: The components list contains all software components, which are licensed under the same license. Both, the DataSetWriterId and the Filter from the DataSetMessage header are related to that license

component.description: This is the name of the component, which uses the license names in the father object

licAuthors.description: This is a list of authors, which are providing this component

licAddText.description: Some components may have extended license information in addition to the license agreements defined for it. This additional information can be placed in licAddText as plain text
